channel.title: SyberWorks e-Learning Lingo Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Al Lemieux
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Anytime, Anyplace
channel.itunes:summary: SyberWorks, Inc., a leader in the custom e-Learning solutions and Learning Management Systems industries presents an podcast series on useful and important topics in e-Learning, Learning Management Systems, custom online training development, instructional design, performance management, talent management, and human capital management.
channel.description: SyberWorks, Inc. Learn Anytime Any Place

item.title: Episode 41: ADDIE Model for Instructional Design
Episode 1: The Advanced Distributed Learning (ADL) Initiative
